text: I Ring Doorbells is a 1946 American comedy-drama movie directed by Frank R. Strayer and was based on the novel of the same name by Russell Birdwell. It stars Anne Gwynne, Robert Shayne, Roscoe Karns, Pierre Watkin, John Eldredge, Jan Wiley. ==Other websites== * * Category:1946 comedy movies Category:1946 drama movies Category:1940s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Frank R. Strayer
title: I Ring Doorbells
